description:
In this video, the construction of the eye is demonstrated; its form and the forms that surround it from a structural point of view. For this purpose, superficial points are established that describe the size and appearance of the planes that compose this essential element of the face.

In this course, the student will learn the fundamental principles of drawing that are not generally taught today. These principles were included in a class called "Procedures," which was common the Academies of Beaux Arts. The purpose of the course is to develop basic abilities, such as the training of the eye and hand; the knowledge and correct use of working materials; the study of 3D, geometric figures (solids); and his/her individual development as well as other basic concepts of drawing - grisaille, value studies, tone and temperature.
title: Drawing the Eye
